conbody.section:
lets you link code to external documentation and documentation to code. This can:
Provide an indication as to the level of documentation debt.
Expose hidden features.
Provide developers the ability to find which documents need to be changed when refactoring code.
Provide the ability to calculate the documentation impact of feature / code changes.
Enable technical authors to track what code is responsible for certain features and functions.

note.p: It is important to note that links in source code which link to documentation files are called Doc Links and Links from documentation to source files are called Source Links.
